mapper.select: select p.prc as 'price', p.name as 'name', p.ctent as 'content', p.UPLOAD_PATH as 'upload_path', p.DC_RATE as 'dc_rate', p.DC_STATE_CD as 'dc_state', pd.prod_idx as 'productNum', pd.ORPLC as 'origin', pd.SLE_UNIT as 'unit', pd.WEIGHT as 'weight', pd.WARN as 'warn', pd.SFKP_TP_STATE_CD as 'packingType' from product p inner join prod_dtl pd on p.idx = pd.prod_idx where pd.prod_idx = #{prod_idx};
